column1: What did the start of your investing journey look like?
What made you want to get into investing?
column2:
Growing my wealth and status to be able to support myself and family from
day to day

column1:
What do you wish you knew when you started investing? 
Or if you were starting from the beginning, what would you have done differently?
column2: Trusted index investing such as S&P 500 or NASDAQ

column1: What are the top three things you look for in a company when investing?
column2:
- Price volatility
- Reliable dividends
- Collapse warnings

column1: What would you want/expect from an AI chatbot (Finance Chat bot specifically)?
column2:
- Transparency
    - Clear sourcing of all data
    - Integration of Excel files
- Analytical partner
    - Devil's Advocate
    - Referring to previous conversations

column1: Have you ever used AI to help you invest and if so, what for?
column2: Only for note taking and research
